Articles.Content:
Hey, guys. I been looking around the forums and spaceport. I found alot of stock alike parts and in the Add-on Dev Section I saw alot of stock alike parts being developed. I been thinking a stockalike revolution is happening now. Is this me or is really happening ?

What do you KSPERs think. Could future mods all be stock alike ?

I hope so. I love the simple style of the stock parts, they allow the coolness of the rocket's design and function to shine beyond it's mere surface appearance. Or in other words, the graphics don't get in the way of the enjoyment.
The future is in procedural parts with alternate looks and decoupled, build-time, colour choice. When stock looks like anything, everything is stockalike
